scripts.deploy: npm run codegen && npm run build && graph deploy  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ hectordao-hec/hector-dao-alt subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run codegen:mainnet && npm run build:mainnet && graph deploy  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ hectordao-hec/hector-dao-alt subgraph.mainnet.yaml
